description: U with a long vertical stroke inserted into the gap of U

features.description: Is the U rounded? 0 = yes, 1 = no
How tall are the sides of the U? 0 = full height, 1 = partial height
How far into the U does the line extend? 0 = full height, 1 = partial height
How is the bottom of the inserted stroke decorated? 0 = plain, 1 = triangle, 2 = circle, 3 = indeterminate
